name: Time May Fly
description:
You're chased by a giant mutant Mayfly and you're short on fuel, so naturally, your best solution is to speed up time until the Mayfly dies.

Graze bullets to speed up time; however, if you receive a direct hit, you lose your time speed bonus. The goal is to maintain a time-speed where the Mayfly's life drains faster than your fuel.

Credits:

Art and Programming - Vivalich

Font (Early Gameboy) - Jimmy Campbell

Main Theme ("Shinamon no Neko") - Rolemusic

Victory Theme ("Towel Defence Press Roll") - sawsquarenoise

Sound Effects - jsfxr
